DataElement.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Social Activities Past 4 Weeks How Much Time Physical Health or Emotional Problems Interference with Social Activities Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how much time during the past 4 weeks has physical health or emotional problems interfered with their social activities (like visiting with friends, relatives, etc.), using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Social Activities Past 4 Weeks Physical Health or Emotional Problems Interference with Social Activities Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A survey of multiple dimensions of support, representing the social activities scale._A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present._The state of a person's physical and emotional well-being._The act of impeding a person from their normal social activities._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A survey of multiple dimensions of support, representing the social activities scale.

Concepts.definition: A survey of multiple dimensions of quality of life, representing the social activities scale.

Property.preferredName: Past 4 Weeks Physical Health or Emotional Problems Interference with Social Activities Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present.:The state of a person's physical and emotional well-being.:The act of impeding a person from their normal social activities.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 28 days before the present.
The state of a person's physical and emotional well-being.
The act of impeding a person from their normal social activities.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
